Call Type Description: A customer calls to inquire about the availability of a specific shoe product, request product information, or compare features and pricing across different products.
Common Inquiries: Product features, pricing, availability, sizing, color options, and style

Call Type Description: A customer calls to track the status of their order, query about delivery dates, or receive clarification on order-related queries.
Common Inquiries: Order status, tracking number, delivery dates, payment options, and return policy

Call Type Description: A customer calls to initiate a return or exchange of a purchased shoe product, citing issues with sizing, fit, or quality.
Common Inquiries: Return and exchange procedures, product acceptance, restocking fees, and refund policies

Call Type Description: A customer calls to compare prices of a specific shoe product across different stores, both online and offline.
Common Inquiries: Price comparison, product features, availability, and promotions

Call Type Description: A customer calls to cancel an existing order, amend their purchase, or change their order details.
Common Inquiries: Cancellation policies, order changes, and refund procedures

Call Type Description: A sales representative calls to inform customers about new shoe products, promotions, discounts, or special offers.
Common Inquiries: Promotions, discounts, product launches, and special offers

Call Type Description: A sales representative calls to upsell customers on complementary shoe products, accessories, or services.
A sales representative calls to gather customer feedback on their most recent shoe purchase or interaction with the store.
Common Inquiries: Customer satisfaction, product quality, and service standards

Call Type Description: A sales representative calls to conduct a survey to gather customer feedback on the store's products, services, and overall experience.
Common Inquiries: Customer satisfaction, product quality, and service standards

Call Type Description: A sales representative calls to inform customers about the loyalty program, offer loyalty rewards, or redeem loyalty points.
Common Inquiries: Loyalty program membership, redemption procedures, and reward options
